title: Mortgage and landlord possession statistics
description:
Possession claim actions in county courts by mortgage lenders and social and private landlords.
This release contains an additional annex related to coronavirus (COVID-19). This annex provides further detail of the early impact of COVID-19 related actions on possession actions in March 2020. Further analysis of the impact on possession claims will be provided in future publications.
datasetNotes: On the landing page page scroll to documents and click on the latest release, this will open a new window, the data can be found under documents, as an ODS and the CVS in a zip file.
sizingNotes: Mostly simple table structure with some foot notes.  Some of the table structures differ, some tables are available as a CVS.
